016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.InstanceConfiguration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client.Cypher;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.client.GraphDatabase;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.neo4j.spi.Neo4jProvider;
023import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObject;
024import com.exoreaction.xorcery.server.api.ServiceResourceObjects;
025import com.exoreaction.xorcery.util.Resources;
026import jakarta.inject.Inject;
027import jakarta.inject.Named;
028import jakarta.inject.Singleton;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
030import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
031import org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.LoggerContext;
032import org.glassfish.hk2.api.Factory;
033import org.glassfish.hk2.api.PreDestroy;
034import org.glassfish.hk2.api.ServiceLocator;
035import org.glassfish.hk2.utilities.ServiceLocatorUtilities;
036import org.jvnet.hk2.annotations.Service;
037import org.neo4j.dbms.api.DatabaseManagementService;
038import org.neo4j.dbms.api.DatabaseManagementServiceBuilder;
039import org.neo4j.dbms.api.DatabaseNotFoundException;
040import org.neo4j.exceptions.KernelException;
041import org.neo4j.graphdb.GraphDatabaseService;
042import org.neo4j.kernel.api.procedure.GlobalProcedures;
043import org.neo4j.kernel.impl.factory.GraphDatabaseFacade;
044import org.neo4j.kernel.impl.transaction.stats.TransactionCounters;
045import org.neo4j.logging.log4j.Log4jLogProvider;
046import org.neo4j.logging.log4j.Neo4jLoggerContext;
047
048import java.io.File;
049import java.io.FileOutputStream;
050import java.io.IOException;
051import java.io.UncheckedIOException;
052import java.net.URL;
053import java.nio.file.Files;
054import java.nio.file.Path;
055import java.util.*;
056
057@Service
058@Named(Neo4jService.SERVICE_TYPE)
059public class Neo4jService
060        implements Factory<GraphDatabase>, PreDestroy {
061
062    private static final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(Neo4jService.class);
063
064    public static final String SERVICE_TYPE = "neo4jdatabase";
065
066    private final DatabaseManagementService managementService;
067    private final GraphDatabase graphDatabase;
068
069    private final LoggerContext loggerContext;
070
071    @Inject
072    public Neo4jService(ServiceResourceObjects serviceResourceObjects,
073                        ServiceLocator serviceLocator,
074                        Configuration configuration,
075                        LoggerContext loggerContext
076    ) throws IOException {
077        this.loggerContext = loggerContext;
078        Neo4jConfiguration neo4jConfiguration = new Neo4jConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("neo4jdatabase"));
079
080        Path home = neo4jConfiguration.getDatabasePath();
081        logger.info("Neo4j home:" + home);
082        File tmpFile = File.createTempFile("neo4jconfig", ".properties");
083        tmpFile.deleteOnExit();
084        Path tmpConfigFile = tmpFile.toPath();
085        try (FileOutputStream out = new FileOutputStream(tmpConfigFile.toFile())) {
086            Map<String, String> settings = neo4jConfiguration.settings();
087            Properties properties = new Properties();
088            properties.putAll(settings);
089            properties.store(out, null);
090        } catch (IOException e) {
091            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
092        }
093        DatabaseManagementService managementService;
094
095        managementService = createDatabaseManagementService(home, tmpConfigFile);
096
097        logger.info("Starting Neo4j database");
098        GraphDatabaseService graphDb;
099        graphDb = createDatabase(managementService);
100
101        boolean wipeOnBreakingChanges = neo4jConfiguration.isWipeOnBreakingChanges();
102        SemanticVersion targetVersion = neo4jConfiguration.getVersion();
103        SemanticVersion currentDatabaseVersion = getExistingDomainVersion(graphDb);
104        if (currentDatabaseVersion == null) {
105            logger.info("Domain schema version of database does not exist.");
106            currentDatabaseVersion = new SemanticVersion(-1, 0, 0); // force a breaking change
107        }
108        if (targetVersion.isBreakingChange(currentDatabaseVersion)) {
109            logger.info("Attempting to update domain schema version of database from {} to {}, this is a breaking change.", currentDatabaseVersion, targetVersion);
110            if (wipeOnBreakingChanges) {
111                logger.warn("WIPING all data in neo4j projection.");
112                managementService.shutdown();
113                wipeDatabase(home.resolve("data"));
114                managementService = createDatabaseManagementService(home, tmpConfigFile);
115                graphDb = createDatabase(managementService);
116                updateDomainVersionInDatabase(graphDb, targetVersion);
117            } else {
118                String msg = String.format("Incompatible database domain schema version, and wipe not allowed. Current version of schema is '%s' and target version is '%s'. Migrate database or set 'neo4jdatabase.domain.wipeOnBreakingChange' to true to allow wipe.", currentDatabaseVersion, targetVersion);
119                logger.error(msg);
120                throw new IllegalStateException(msg);
121            }
122        } else if (!currentDatabaseVersion.equals(targetVersion)) {
123            logger.info("Automatically updating domain version of database from {} to {}.", currentDatabaseVersion, targetVersion);
124            updateDomainVersionInDatabase(graphDb, targetVersion);
125        } else {
126            logger.info("Target domain schema version matches current database schema version {}", targetVersion);
127        }
128
129        // Register procedures
130        try {
131            GlobalProcedures globalProcedures = ((GraphDatabaseFacade) graphDb).getDependencyResolver().resolveDependency(GlobalProcedures.class);
132            globalProcedures.registerComponent(ServiceLocator.class, (ctx) -> serviceLocator, false);
133
134            for (Neo4jProvider neo4jProvider : ServiceLoader.load(Neo4jProvider.class)) {
135                globalProcedures.registerProcedure(neo4jProvider.getClass());
136                globalProcedures.registerFunction(neo4jProvider.getClass());
137            }
138        } catch (KernelException e) {
139            throw new RuntimeException(e);
140        }
141
142        // Run Cypher schemas
143        try {
144            Iterable<URL> schemas = Resources.getResources("META-INF/neo4j/schema.cyp");
145            for (URL schema : schemas) {
146                try {
147                    logger.info("Running Neo4j schema script:" + schema.toExternalForm());
148                    List<String> statements = Cypher.getCypherStatements(schema);
149
150                    for (String statement : statements) {
151                        graphDb.executeTransactionally(statement);
152                    }
153                } catch (Throwable e) {
154                    logger.error(e);
155                }
156            }
157        } catch (Throwable e) {
158            logger.error(e);
159        }
160
161        // Run startup Cypher
162        for (String cypherResource : neo4jConfiguration.getStartupCypherStatements()) {
163            try {
164                logger.info("Running Neo4j startup script:" + cypherResource);
165                List<String> statements = Cypher.getCypherStatements(cypherResource);
166
167                for (String statement : statements) {
168                    graphDb.executeTransactionally(statement);
169                }
170            } catch (Throwable e) {
171                logger.error(e);
172            }
173        }
174
175        graphDatabase = new GraphDatabase(graphDb, Cypher.defaultFieldMappings());
176        ServiceLocatorUtilities.addOneConstant(serviceLocator, graphDb, "neo4j", GraphDatabaseService.class);
177        this.managementService = managementService;
178
179        logger.info("Neo4j started");
180
181        serviceResourceObjects.add(new ServiceResourceObject.Builder(new InstanceConfiguration(configuration.getConfiguration("instance")), SERVICE_TYPE)
182                .api("neo4j", "api/neo4j")
183                .build());
184    }
185
186    private DatabaseManagementService createDatabaseManagementService(Path home, Path tmpConfigFile) {
187        return new DatabaseManagementServiceBuilder(home)
188                .setUserLogProvider(new Log4jLogProvider(new Neo4jLoggerContext(loggerContext, () -> {
189                })))
190                .loadPropertiesFromFile(tmpConfigFile)
191                .build();
192    }
193
194    private static GraphDatabaseService createDatabase(DatabaseManagementService managementService) {
195        GraphDatabaseService graphDb;
196        try {
197            graphDb = managementService.database("neo4j");
198        } catch (DatabaseNotFoundException e) {
199            managementService.createDatabase("neo4j");
200            graphDb = managementService.database("neo4j");
201        }
202        return graphDb;
203    }
204
205    private static SemanticVersion getExistingDomainVersion(GraphDatabaseService graphDb) {
206        return graphDb.executeTransactionally("MATCH (n:XorceryProjectionDomainSchema) RETURN n.version AS ver", Map.of(), result -> {
207            if (result.hasNext()) {
208                Map<String, Object> row = result.next();
209                String version = (String) row.get("ver");
210                return SemanticVersion.from(version);
211            }
212            return null;
213        });
214    }
215
216    /**
217     * This method will wipe ALL data in the database, do not use unless you know what you are doing!
218     *
219     * @param neo4jData the data folder of the neo4j server instance.
220     */
221    private static void wipeDatabase(Path neo4jData) {
222        try {
223            Files.walk(neo4jData)
224                    .sorted(Comparator.reverseOrder())
225                    .map(Path::toFile)
226                    .forEach(File::delete);
227        } catch (IOException e) {
228            throw new UncheckedIOException(e);
229        }
230    }
231
232    private static void updateDomainVersionInDatabase(GraphDatabaseService graphDb, SemanticVersion currentVersion) {
233        graphDb.executeTransactionally("MERGE (n:XorceryProjectionDomainSchema) SET n.version = $ver RETURN n", Map.of("ver", currentVersion.toString()));
234    }
235
236    @Override
237    public void preDestroy() {
238        managementService.shutdown();
239    }
240
241    @Override
242    @Singleton
243    @Named(Neo4jService.SERVICE_TYPE)
244    public GraphDatabase provide() {
245        return graphDatabase;
246    }
247
248    @Override
249    public void dispose(GraphDatabase instance) {
250        TransactionCounters txCounters = ((GraphDatabaseFacade) provide().getGraphDatabaseService()).getDependencyResolver().resolveDependency(TransactionCounters.class);
251        logger.info("Shutting down Neo4j");
252        logger.debug("Currently open transactions:" + txCounters.getNumberOfActiveTransactions());
253
254        // Do nothing
255    }
256}
